title: paella-core pop up button plugin settings
description: Common configuration options for paella-core pop up button plugins.

enabled.description: Defines whether the plugin is active or not.

order.description: Within each plugin type, the loading order is defined by the 'order' attribute. The lower the order attribute is, the sooner the plugin will be loaded.

id.description: Returns the value of the 'id' attribute that the '<button>' element of the plugin will have.

name.description: Returns the value of the 'name' attribute that the '<button>' element of the plugin will have.

ariaLabel.description: Defines the text used in the 'aria-label' attribute of the button.

tabIndex.description: Defines the tab index to be used for scrolling through the buttons using the tab key

description.description: Descriptive text of the button, which can be displayed at different times depending on the paella-core configuration.

minContainerSize.description: paella-core >= 1.14. is used to set a minimum required size of the playback bar to show the button plugin

side.description: Affects the side on the horizontal axis that the button is placed. It only affects iun case the 'parentContainer' is the playback or the video container.

closePopUps.description: Indicates whether to close any pop-up that is currently open when the button is clicked.

parentContainer.description: Allows to select the parent container that contains the button. You can use the 'playbackBar' or the 'videoContainer' containers, or any other container defined by a ButtonGroupPluin in the 'groupName' property

closeParentPopUp.description: Determines whether the parent pop up window should be closed when the child pop up (this pop up) is closed, if this button plugin is placed in a popup window.

popUpType.description: paella-core >= 1.20. Defines the type of pop up that the button will display.

menuTitle.description: Adds a title to the menu options.
